summary: This bill, the Veterans Scam And Fraud Evasion Act of 2025 (VSAFE Act of 2025), aims to combat fraud and scams targeting veterans. It establishes a Veterans Scam and Fraud Evasion Officer within the Department of Veterans Affairs. This officer will be responsible for fraud prevention, reporting, and response plans. Key responsibilities include communication, guidance, promotion of resources, monitoring fraud metrics, training employees, and coordination with other agencies and organizations. The bill also modifies home loan fees for veterans.
